text: وَأَلَّوِ ٱسۡتَقَٰمُواْ عَلَى ٱلطَّرِيقَةِ لَأَسۡقَيۡنَٰهُم مَّآءً غَدَقٗا

translation.en: And [Allah revealed] that if they had remained straight on the way, We would have given them abundant provision
translation.id: Dan sekiranya mereka tetap berjalan lurus di atas jalan itu (agama Islam), niscaya Kami akan mencurahkan kepada mereka air yang cukup
